# serval_team (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_team" "example_team" {
  description = "description"
  name = "name"
  prefix = "prefix"
  user_ids = ["string"]
}
```

## Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

- `description` (Optional) The description of the team.
- `name` (Optional) The name of the team.
- `prefix` (Optional) The prefix of the team.
- `user_ids` (Optional) The IDs of users in the team.

## Attribute Reference

This resource exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the team.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `organization_id` (String) The ID of the organization the team belongs to.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_team.example '<id>'
```
